description:
With candlemaking the more techniques and formulas you have under your belt the more your creative potential grows.

In the third of the series we will be discussing extensive formulas to achieve just this. The course contains secrets other candlemakers do not want to share as they translate into income. We will be discussing how to create vessels and vases, illuminating lanterns, duplicating natural textures and much more. For anyone that wishes to increase their knowledge of design work this course is essential as it opens up new doorways for the imagination for creativity. Some of these techniques have taken years to discovery but can be yours with simple step by step instructions on how to acheive perfect results
title: Learn Candlemaking to Start a Business Course 3
